description: Many of the XML responses generated by the OSAPI fail to return a document header: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>. The expected behavior is to have those headers in all XML responses.
title: OSAPI XML Serialization is missing xml document header

comments.content: Many of the XML responses generated by the OSAPI fail to return a document header: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>. The expected behavior is to have those headers in all XML responses.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: @Titan team: anyone actually working on this ? If not, please unassign yourself to let someone else have a shot at it ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
